name: Speed Cave Golf!
description:
This is a speed running golf game I made in my spare time. The objective is to complete the entire 3 level stage in as little time as possible.

I hope you enjoy it!

I might add more 3 level stages in the future, as well as music, sounds and also leaderboards, maybe.

How to play:

Click and drag anywhere and then release to hit the ball, P for pause. Oh and you can only hit the ball when it's on the ground.
